article.title: General Dynamics to Develop Robotic Roller
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Dynamics Robotics Systems, Westminster, Maryland, has been awarded a more than $13 million contract to provide for Phase II of the Joint Improvised Explosive Devices Defeat Organization's program to develop a remotely-operated ground vehicle utilizing a roller to neutralize victim operated improvised explosive devices. The Army Research Office, Research Triangle Park, Durham, North Carolina, is the contracting activity.
